name: Oasis Showdown
description:
Oasis Showdown

This game was made in collaboration with Oliver Schlampp. Our second game

and our second Game Jam.

The Game Jam we submitted it on was the "Mini Jam 53". And it was made in

72 hours.

The theme of the jam was "Oasis" and the limitation was "Perma-death".

Hope you'll enjoy it ^^

PD: The game is in early state. Please report any bugs or glitches . And suggestions are welcomed as well.
